maxModeDownsampling.description: Use maximum-mode downsampling when reducing cube size before uploading to the GPU.

foveatedRendering.description: Use foveated rendering to improve rendering performance at the expense of image quality in the periphery.

bilinearFiltering.description: Use bilinear filtering when sampling from the data texture on the GPU. Smooths cube appearance at the expense of performance.

gpuMemoryLimitMb.description: Maximum size (in megabytes) of cubes uploaded to the GPU. Cubes larger than this limit will be downsampled before GPU upload.

maxRaymarchingSteps.description: Maximum number of raymarching steps to take when rendering the cube. A larger number of steps will improve cube appearance when large cubes are used, at the expense of performance.
